articles.title: Fed Should Lower Rates If the Market Does Well, Trump Says
articles.mainIdea: Fed Should Lower Rates If the Market Does Well, Trump Says
articles.summary: Bloomberg: Fed Should Lower Rates If the Market Does Well, Trump Says. “I want my new Fed Chairman to lower Interest Rates if the Market is doing well, not destroy the Market for no reason whatsoever,” Trump said in a social media post Tuesday. Trump has repeatedly said he’s interested in breaking recent trends, where promising economic data is sometimes met by a market selloff due to concerns over inflation and corresponding hikes by the Fed.

articles.title: ServiceNow shares edge lower as Armis deal confirmed
articles.mainIdea: ServiceNow shares edge lower as Armis deal confirmed
articles.summary: Investing.com: ServiceNow shares edge lower as Armis deal confirmed. Investing.com -- ServiceNow shares edged 0.4% lower premarket on Tuesday after the company confirmed it will acquire cybersecurity firm Armis for $7.75 billion in cash. Related tickers mentioned: NOW.

articles.title: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares
articles.mainIdea: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares. OSB GROUP PLC ISIN: GB00BLDRH36023 December 2025 LEI number: 213800ZBKL9BHSL2K459 OSB GROUP PLC (the “Company”) Transaction in Own Shares The Company announces that on 22 December 2025 it had purchased a total of 168,283 of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "ordinary shares") on the London Stock Exchange, CBOE BXE and CBOE CXE, through the Company's broker Citigroup Global Markets Limited as detailed below. The repurchased ordinary shares will be cancelled. London Stock ExchangeCBOE BXECBOE Related tickers mentioned: CBOE, OSBGF.
